code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{fetchBooks,deleteBook}from'../api';import Book from'./BookForm';import Loader from'./Loader';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BookList=()=>{const[books,setBooks]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{setLoading(true);fetchBooks().then(books=>{setBooks(books);setLoading(false);});},[]);const handleDelete=id=>{deleteBook(id).then(()=>{setBooks(books.filter(book=>book.id!==id));});};if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Loader,{});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"book-list",children:books.map(book=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Book,{book:book,onDelete:handleDelete},book.id))});};export default BookList;
